trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised when the first HTTP module in the web application references the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=fullName>evento é gerado quando o módulo HTTP do primeiro na aplicação web referencia o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The first access of the this property causes a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object to be created and initialized from configuration.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro o acesso a esta propriedade causas um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>objeto ser criado e inicializar a partir da configuração.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: You can access the newly created <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in an event handler in order to examine or modify it.
trans-unit.target: Pode aceder ao recém-criado <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>objeto mediante a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de um processador de eventos para examinar ou modificá-lo.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified federation configuration object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o objeto de configuração de Federação especificado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A> property to the federation configuration object specified by `config`.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A>propriedade para o objeto de configuração de Federação especificado pelo `config`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A>
O objeto de configuração de Federação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> object contains the configurable properties for the WS-Federation Authentication Module (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule"></xref>) and the Session Authentication Module (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule"></xref>) in a web application.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"> </xref> objeto contém as propriedades configuráveis para o módulo de autenticação de WS-Federation (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule"></xref>) e o módulo de autenticação de sessão (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule"></xref>) numa aplicação web.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the federation configuration object that was initialized from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto de configuração de Federação foi inicializado no ficheiro de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object contains the configurable properties for the WS-Federation Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>) and the Session Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>) in a web application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>objeto contém as propriedades configuráveis para o módulo de autenticação de WS-Federation (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>) e o módulo de autenticação de sessão (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>) numa aplicação web.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: To modify the configuration settings, you can set properties on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object that is referenced by this property, or you can provide an new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object.
trans-unit.target: Para modificar as definições de configuração, pode definir propriedades no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>objeto que é referenciado por esta propriedade, ou pode fornecer um novo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>objeto.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: The federation configuration object that was initialized from configuration.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de configuração de Federação foi inicializado da configuração.
